persistence-unit.name: PPAFGestionPU
persistence-unit.description:
Main persistence unit, all entity classes are detected by spring while doing the component scanning via the PersistenceAnnotationBeanPostProcessor
If you want to exclude specific classes you will need to set them manually and specify <exclude-unlisted-classes /> Example : <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Contact</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Item</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Itemlieudedepot</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Itemlieudestockage</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Lieudedepot</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Lieudestockage</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Membreppaf</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Role</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Rolemembre</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Suivicontact</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Suividulieudedepot</class> <class>com.eldoraludo.ppafgestion.domain.Utilisateur</class> <exclude-unlisted-classes />
